mdRecord.dcterms:title: Collection of short stories
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Collection of short stories. Hand written notes and child-like drawings. Book, title unknown, title page missing, a collection of short stories. Book signed Calohill M. Stigleman, Alleghany Springs, May 19, 1853. Publishing date missing. Book in poor condition. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bible sotries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
